results.title: Leaves
results.brief_description: A study of the various types of leaves and their structure and function; the parts of a leaf are studied in detail, and a cross-section shows the arrangement of the cells and veins and the actual process of transforming water and minerals and gases into food for the plant.
results.description: A study of the various types of leaves and their structure and function; the parts of a leaf are studied in detail, and a cross-section shows the arrangement of the cells and veins and the actual process of transforming water and minerals and gases into food for the plant.

results.title: Learning to swim with artifical aids
results.brief_description: A teacher shows children what they can do with swimming aids. Elementary versions of breast, front and back crawl strokes are introduced. The flipper-float method is also shown on both the back and the front.

results.title: Learning to swim: the crawl stroke
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advance Australia”.
Demonstrates the simplest of all swimming styles, the crawl. Shows how to develop confidence, buoyancy, correct leg and arm action, correct breathing and co-ordination for the full movement.

results.title: Learning lacrosse. Part two. Defence
results.creator_credit: Douglas Jackson, Walford Hewitson and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Using close-up, slow-motion and stop-motion, the film clearly demonstrates the tricks of play that might otherwise be too fast or complicated to see. Shows a series of defensive moves including cross checking and stick checking.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Douglas Jackson, Walford Hewitson and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Learning about flowers
results.brief_description: An instructional film for primary classes explaining that the main function of flowers is to produce seeds. Identifies some common varieties of flowers including the morning glory, goatsbeard tulip, pussy willow and dogwood. Observes by use of close up time-lapse photography the stages in the growth of a bud, and in the growth of fruits from flowers.

results.title: Layout and handling in factories
results.brief_description: The effect on production costs, time and workers’ well-being of imperfect factory layout. Various examples show that regrouping of existing equipment and the addition of new can significantly increase productivity and repay capital outlay.

results.title: Lay it on the line: a study in campaign fire management
results.brief_description: Through a lecture, to a group of firemen, and footage shot during an actual fire in California, the film explains what must be done by various people to contain fires of different sizes.
